title: R160_390
body:
Family: R160
Final Drive: 3.90
LSD: Open (some WRX viscous LSD)
Notes: Match trans FD

title: R160_411
body:
Family: R160
Final Drive: 4.11
LSD: Open
Notes: Match 4EAT 4.11

title: R160_370
body:
Family: R160
Final Drive: 3.70
LSD: Some viscous LSD
Notes: Unique; common swap trap

title: R180_390
body:
Family: R180
Final Drive: 3.90
LSD: Clutch LSD
Notes: Requires STI axles/hubs or hybrid conversion

title: Rear Differential Capacity (FA24)
body: 1.15 Liters (1.2 Quarts). Use GL-5 75W-85 (Toyota Diff Gear Oil LX).
notes: Spec changed to 75W-85 for Gen 2 LSD.
